ValidationRule.description: Validación del dígito de control. Solo aplica para formato NIF (00000000A).
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> 'API Only', $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name <> 'Administrador del sistema', NOT ISBLANK(CC_Numero_Documento__c), ISNUMBER(LEFT(CC_Numero_Documento__c, 8)), NOT(ISNUMBER(RIGHT(CC_Numero_Documento__c, 1))), RIGHT(CC_Numero_Documento__c, 1) <> CASE(MOD(VALUE(LEFT(CC_Numero_Documento__c, 8)), 23), 0, "T", 1, "R", 2, "W", 3, "A", 4, "G", 5, "M", 6, "Y", 7, "F", 8, "P", 9, "D", 10, "X", 11, "B", 12, "N", 13, "J", 14, "Z", 15, "S", 16, "Q", 17, "V", 18, "H", 19, "L", 20, "C", 21, "K", 22, "E", "error") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: El dígito de control no coincide con el número del NIF.
